user_query: I am planning a team-building event for my company. Can you provide me with ideas for fun activities, team-building exercises, and venues? Also, suggest some motivational speeches and provide me with the card information for booking the event space.

TaskList.description: Research and generate a list of fun activities suitable for team-building events.
Compile suggestions for team-building exercises that foster collaboration and communication among team members.
Identify and recommend suitable venues for hosting the team-building event, considering location and capacity.
Gather motivational speech ideas or potential speakers who can inspire the team during the event.
Collect payment card information and booking details needed to secure the event space.
